channel.title: Activities on Institute of Smart City & Management
channel.description: Recent content in Activities on Institute of Smart City & Management

item.title: ISCM Event Series 2022 - A Future Resilience Through Smart City Lens
ArtTech Fusion for Future Smart Cities
item.description: ABOUT THE ACTIVITY In the SMARTCITY+ event series, ArtTech Fusion 2021, which is hosted by the University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City (UEH), presided by the Institute of Smart City and Management (ISCM), co-organized by the Institute of Innovation (UII), UEH Youth union - Vietnamese Students’ Association, and Phố Bên Đồi.

item.title: THE 1ST INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE: RESILIENCE BY TECHNOLOGY AND DESIGN (RTD-2022)
item.description: THE 1ST INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE: RESILIENCE BY TECHNOLOGY AND DESIGN (RTD-2022) The College of Technology and Design (CTD) of the University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City (UEH), together with universities worldwide, organizes the international conference Resilience by Technology and Design (RTD).

item.title: INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE - SUSTAINABLE UNIVERSITY DEVELOPMENT: OPPORTUNITY AND CHALLENGE (SUDOC) 2022
item.description: INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE - SUSTAINABLE UNIVERSITY DEVELOPMENT: OPPORTUNITY AND CHALLENGE (SUDOC) 2022 Sustainable development has opened up many opportunities but brought about challenges as well.
